name: MoPub-Applovin-Adapters
summary: Applovin Adapters for mediating through MoPub.
description:
Supported ad formats: Banners, Interstitial, Rewarded Video and Native.

To download and integrate the Applovin SDK, please check this page: https://www.applovin.com/integration#iosMoPubIntegration. 


For inquiries and support, please visit https://www.applovin.com/support
